{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15579v1", "title": "A characterization of closed subfunctors through $3\times 3$-lemma
  property in extriangulated categories", "summary": "Given an extriangulated category $(\mathcal{C},\mathbb{E},\mathfrak{s})$, we
introduce the $3 \times 3$-lemma property for subfunctors of $\mathbb{E}$ and
prove that an additive subfunctor $\mathbb{F}$ of $\mathbb{E}$ is closed if,
and only if, it satisfies this condition. This characterization extends a well
known result by A. Buan (for abelian categories) to extriangulated categories.
As an application of this result, we get a new equivalent condition to describe
saturated proper classes $\xi$ in $\mathcal{C}$.", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-22T04:33:20Z"}
